pageContext.claim: “For the most part, I didn't campaign for the House, but I did actually make a special trip for Andy Barr because he was in a very tough race in Kentucky, and he won. That was a very tough race. The polls were all showing that he was down, and down substantially. And he won. And that one, I did do.”
pageContext.analysis: Barr was favored to win this House race, according to 538. More than a few polls showed him ahead of his Democratic rival.
